title: Italian Design Studios/Bureaus/Agencies
content:
My dearest fellow Typophiles,

As I am currently heavily considerung moving/relocating to Italia, within the next year(s), I am about to compile a list of brand/design/typography related studios/bureaus/agencies, located in (northern/central) Italy. And I am more than thankful for any name mentioned or link revealed.

_(And, If anyone is reading this who, or whose employer, is already seeking, or consider hiring, an additional designer, for 2009, please, let me now. Concerning eventual language barriers, I am capable of English and German, and right now willing, wanting and working on improving my Italian. ;)_

Thank you,  
Dav _(formlos/Forma)_  
_mail(at)davidhubner.com_
author: Dav
